column5: Hi there my friends and our planning a fishing trip this Saturday for pike. Do to the high water levels I can't find anyone that is renting boats along the trent. I was looking to go in the Hastings/Campbellford area.  Does anyone know someone who is actually renting boats, or wants to rent theres?  Thanks any help would be great!

the hastings and cambellford area have very high water warnings right now,and i doubt any outfitter would rent in those conditions?? thats gonna be a tough area to fish for at least another week,very strong current and i heard almost all the bouys are under water ...might wanna check first be safe not dead....
They are right.  The Trent is a Washout.   Try Wabushene or Honey Harbor instead.
Musky landing in Port Severn is just chompin at the bit... all 5 or 6 of their boats in the water, tied to the dock and ready to go yesterday!
